doc.title: Jack Elias: Life of a Sephardic Artist
doc.plot: This exploration of the life, art, and philosophy of Sephardic artist Jack Elias presents us with a fascinating overview of a uniquely gifted man. The film covers his 1920's childhood on the Lower East Side, his WWII service on an Aviation Rescue Boat, work in the oil fields of Maricaibo, Venezuela, to his career as an aerospace engineer & inventior.
